description.p: FinalShell is an all-in-one server and network management software, not only as a ssh client, but also as a powerful development and operation and maintenance tool, fully meeting the needs of development and operation and maintenance.
tips: Due to flatpak sandbox limitations, please do not check for upgrades within the application.

Features. Cloud synchronization, free remote desktop acceleration for overseas servers, ssh acceleration, localized command input box, support for auto-completion, command history, custom command parameters.
NOTE: This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by www.hostbuf.com.
About High Definition Screen: https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/HiDPI GDK_SCALE=2 GDK_DPI_SCALE=0.5
FinalShell是一体化的的服务器,网络管理软件,不仅是ssh客户端,还是功能强大的开发,运维工具,充分满足开发,运维需求.
注意: 由于flatpak 沙盒限制, 请不要在应用内检查升级.
特色功能: 云端同步,免费海外服务器远程桌面加速,ssh加速,本地化命令输入框,支持自动补全,命令历史,自定义命令参数
提示: 本构建未经www.hostbuf.com验证, 或得到www.hostbuf.com的支持。这个一个个人构建版本。
关于高分屏 https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/HiDPI 用flatseal配置环境变量即可;2k,192的字体dpi可以设置: GDK_SCALE=2 GDK_DPI_SCALE=0.5
